alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 1:55PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of east central Tooele County through 245 PM MDT... At 153 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers over Ophir, or 12 miles south of Tooele, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Stansbury Park, Ophir, Tooele Army Depot, Tooele Army Depot South, Stockton, Rush Valley, Lake Point and Erda. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 79 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
